member.name: T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeConnectionPoolSettings
member.summary: Represents settings that control the behavior of the named pipe connection pool.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeConnectionPoolSettings.GroupName
member.summary: Gets or sets the group name of the connection pool group on the client.
member.returns: The name of the connection pool group on the client. The default name is "default".

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeConnectionPoolSettings.IdleTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum time the connection can be idle in the connection pool before being disconnected.
member.exception: The value is less than zero.
member.returns: Returns a structure that indicates the maximum time the connection can be idle in the connection pool before being disconnected.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeConnectionPoolSettings.MaxOutboundConnectionsPerEndpoint
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of outbound connections for each endpoint that is cached in the connection pool.
member.exception: The value is less than or equal to zero.
member.returns: The maximum number of allowed outbound connections for each endpoint that is cached in the connection pool. The default value is 10.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeTransportBindingElement.Scheme
member.summary: Returns the URI scheme for the transport.
member.returns: Returns the URI scheme for the transport, which is "net.pipe".

member.name: T:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding
member.summary: Provides a secure and reliable binding that is optimized for on-machine communication.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.#ctor(System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurityMode)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified security mode.
member.param: The value that specifies whether Windows security is used with named pipes.

member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.CreateBindingElements
member.summary: Creates a collection with the binding elements for the binding.
member.returns: The of type that makes up the binding.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.EnvelopeVersion
member.summary: Gets the version of SOAP that is used for messages processed by this binding.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.MaxBufferPoolSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of bytes that are used to buffer incoming messages in memory.
member.returns: The maximum number of bytes that are used to buffer incoming messages in memory. The default value is 524,288 bytes.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.MaxBufferSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of bytes used to buffer incoming messages in memory.
member.exception: The value set is less than 0.
member.returns: The maximum number of bytes that are used to buffer incoming messages in memory. The default value is 65,536 bytes.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.MaxConnections
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of connections, both inbound and outbound, that are allowed to endpoints configured with the named pipe binding.
member.returns: The maximum number of named pipe connections that are allowed with this binding. The default value is 10.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.MaxReceivedMessageSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, for a received message that is processed by the binding.
member.returns: The maximum size (in bytes) for a received message that is processed by the binding. The default value is 65,536 bytes.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.ReaderQuotas
member.summary: Gets or sets constraints on the complexity of SOAP messages that can be processed by endpoints configured with this binding.
member.returns: The that specifies the complexity constraints on SOAP messages exchanged. The default values for these constraints are provided in the following Remarks section.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.Scheme
member.summary: Gets the URI transport scheme for the channels and listeners that are configured with this binding.
member.returns: Returns "net.pipe".

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.Security
member.summary: Gets an object that specifies the type of security used with services configured with this binding.
member.returns: The that is used with this binding. The default value is .

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding.TransferMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the service configured with the binding uses streamed (in one or both directions) or buffered modes of message transfer.
member.returns: The value that indicates whether the service configured with the binding uses streamed (in one or both directions) or buffered modes of message transfer. The default is .

member.summary: Gets the transport security for the named pipe binding.

member.name: T:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurityMode
member.summary: Specifies whether transport-level security is used with named pipes.

member.name: F:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurityMode.None
member.summary: Indicates no security is used with the named pipe transport.

member.name: F:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurityMode.Transport
